description: This file defines a JavaScript component for a shopping cart interface in a frontend application, built using the LightningJS framework. It includes UI definitions, state management, and methods for refreshing the cart and processing checkout.

classes.name: Cart
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the shopping cart interface, including display of items, total calculation, and checkout logic.

methods.name: computeDerived
methods.description: Calculates display texts for each cart item and total price.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Updates the component's items from the store and recalculates derived data.

methods.name: checkout
methods.description: Handles the checkout process by creating an order via API, clearing the cart, and updating store states.

methods.name: buttonClicked
methods.description: Handles button click event to trigger checkout.
